string.text: You’re willing to research the most recent developments in the Zone
You don’t try to avoid dangerous mutants - you hunt them
You uncovered the secret behind stalker disappearances at Skadovsk
You showed the bandits and their leader who’s boss
You helped Sultan outmaneuver the stalkers
You brought the scumbag to justice
You found every type of artifact known to Zone researchers
Now Cardan has all the tools he’ll ever need
Azot has all the tools a Zone technician could dream of
There are no areas in the the Zone that you haven’t been to yet
You put a great squad together and proved you're a leader.
You know how to solve a problem peacefully
Everyone in the scientists’ bunker considers you one of their own.
You have provided plenty of help to Duty
You have provided plenty of help to Freedom
You didn’t side with either faction and always acted as a free stalker
You’re not doing too badly at the moment, your wealth in considerable
Your foresight has served you well
You managed to survive an emission without taking cover thanks to the anabiotic pills
When you get your hands on a piece of info, you always find the right buyer
You’ve always helped out stalkers in trouble

Any content purchased in an in-game store will be purchased from Sony Interactive Entertainment Network Europe Limited (“SIENE”) and be subject to PlayStation™Network Terms of Service and User Agreement which is available on the PlayStation®Store. Please check usage rights for each purchase as these may differ from item to item. Unless otherwise shown, content available in any in-game store has the same age rating as the game.
string.text_US: Purchase and use of items are subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This online service has been sublicensed to you by Sony Interactive Entertainment America.

string.text:
This is the console version of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat.
 
 In the world of the Zone, time stands still, frozen at the moment of the ChNPP catastrophe. While we've updated certain elements, some aspects that may seem controversial for us today, remain unchanged to retain the authenticity and atmosphere of the game.
 It's important to acknowledge that there are facets of the game that may not align with our current views or values. However, these unchanged elements are a part of the game's legacy, and we've chosen to maintain them as they were originally created.
 
 Any references included in the game serve to enhance the atmosphere and provide historical context within the artistic work. We hope you'll embrace the Zone and its mysteries, much like the many stalkers before you.
 
Happy hunting!
 Sincerely,
 GSC Game World Team
string.text_ps5:
This is the PlayStation®5 console version of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat
 
 In the world of the Zone, time stands still, frozen at the moment of the ChNPP catastrophe. While we've updated certain elements, some aspects that may seem controversial for us today, remain unchanged to retain the authenticity and atmosphere of the game.
 It's important to acknowledge that there are facets of the game that may not align with our current views or values. However, these unchanged elements are a part of the game's legacy, and we've chosen to maintain them as they were originally created.
 
 Any references included in the game serve to enhance the atmosphere and provide historical context within the artistic work. We hope you'll embrace the Zone and its mysteries, much like the many stalkers before you.
 
Happy hunting!
 Sincerely,
 GSC Game World Team
